official_title: Therapeutic Role of Dietary Nitrates on Cardiovascular Function in Cancer Survivors Treated With Anthracycline Chemotherapy
inclusion_criteria:
* cancer survivors (at least 1 year post treatment)
* Prior administration of anthracycline chemotherapy
* partial/complete remission
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 21 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Unable to provide informed consent
* Kidney disease
* High risk of kidney stones
* Diagnosed hemochromatosis
* Pregnant, breast feeding, or planning to become pregnant
* Non-English speaking
